title: How astronauts handle medical meltdowns in space
description: When astronauts go into space they need to be in peak physical fitness, but that doesnt mean they cant get sick. And when they do, there is no clinic or hospital nearby. In this episode, Loren visits the STRATUS Center in Boston, where simulations are being developed to train astronauts on how to handle medical emergencies.
